Epic Tenacity.name: Epic Tenacity
Epic Tenacity.flavor: You shake off a potential killing blow, resolute in your determination to defeat your enemies.
Epic Tenacity.trigger: You drop to 0 hit points or fewer.
Epic Tenacity.effect: You regain hit points as if you had spent a healing surge, and you gain a +5 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Unmatched Defense.name: Unmatched Defense
Unmatched Defense.flavor: At the last moment you slip aside, somehow dodging a blow that should have claimed your life.
keywords:
Personal

Trigger: You are hit by an attack.

Effect: You treat the triggering attack roll as a natural 1.
Unmatched Defense.trigger: You are hit by an attack.
Unmatched Defense.effect: You treat the triggering attack roll as a natural 1.
